sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>16</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/16</github_url> <message>If you want to relink your scoped app to a new repo, you have to delete the existing repo link for the app from sys_repo_config table. Deleting the existing link will allow you to use studio to add the new repo link.</message> <number>TIL0001009</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 15:50:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c2a397f91b3894108ed631d7dc4bcbf2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>Link Repo For Scoped App</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
